Gene.FullName: PMS1 homolog 2, mismatch repair system component

Classification.Comment: The c.1865_1887del23 pathogenic mutation, located in coding exon 11 of the PMS2 gene, results from a deletion of 23 nucleotides at nucleotide positions 1865 to 1887, causing a translational frameshift with a predicted alternate stop codon (p.M622Kfs*6). This alteration is expected to result in loss of function by premature protein truncation or nonsense-mediated mRNA decay. As such, this alteration is interpreted as a disease-causing mutation.

SubmissionNameList.SubmissionName: All AVA3 Novel and Update Variants_103122
